name: BabyBoom
description:
What happens when a 1000 babies are on the loose and you're the only one that can get them all back to the day care center before they sound the alarm?

Welcome to BabyBoom!

Touch the ankle biters to guide them out of the room before they touch anything and sound the alarm.

Earn Extra points by herding the babies out of the rooms closely together.

It appears easy at first but as any new parent knows it gets tricky fast.

Good luck!
